dddabe0a6ff5deb6dc9e3641be46c42d.sentence: i know this unit will have problem in the future and the $ 40 for the 2 year `` no question asked `` replacement warranty will be worth it , since creative will only warrant it for 90 day - which in itself is totally ridiculous !

ef25a24c12ae7b697445f8d181fbe847.sentence: like it 's predecessor , the quickly revised nx , this player boast a decent size and weight , a relatively-intuitive navigational system that categorizes based on id3 tag , and excellent sound ( widely known to be better than ipod - not surprising considering the number of year creative has been in the audio peripheral business ) .
